verses.verse: <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H6213>kept<s%> a <S%H6453>Passover<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and they <S%H7819>killed<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> on the <S%H702>fourteenth<s%> day of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month.<s%>
He <S%H5975>set<s%> the <S%H3548>priests<s%> in their <S%H4931>offices,<s%> and <S%H2388>encouraged<s%> them to the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> who <S%H995>taught<s%> all <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> who were <S%H6918>holy<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> <S%H5414>"Put<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H727>ark<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> which <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H1129>built.<s%> There shall no more be a <S%H4853>burden<s%> on your <S%H3802>shoulders.<s%> Now <S%H5647>serve<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> your <S%H430>God,<s%> and his <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

<S%H3559>Prepare<s%> yourselves after your <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%> by your <S%H4256>divisions,<s%> according to the <S%H3791>writing<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and according to the <S%H4385>writing<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son.<s%>

Stand <S%H5975>in<s%> the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place according to the <S%H6391>divisions<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' <S%H1004>houses<s%> of your <S%H251>brothers<s%> the children of the <S%H1121>people,<s%> and let there be for each a <S%H2515>portion<s%> of a <S%H1>fathers<s%>' house of the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

<S%H7819>Kill<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover,<s%> and <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H3559>yourselves,<s%> and prepare for your <S%H251>brothers,<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H3027>by<s%> <S%H4872>Moses.<s%>"

<S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H7311>gave<s%> to the children of the <S%H1121>people,<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> <S%H3532>lambs<s%> and young <S%H1121>goats,<s%> all of them for the Passover <S%H6453>offerings,<s%> to all who were <S%H4672>present,<s%> to the <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H505>thousand,<s%> and <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1241>bulls:<s%> these were of the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H7399>substance.<s%>

His <S%H8269>princes<s%> <S%H7311>gave<s%> for a freewill <S%H5071>offering<s%> to the <S%H5971>people,<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and to the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%> <S%H2518>Hilkiah<s%> and <S%H2148>Zechariah<s%> and <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> the <S%H5057>rulers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests<s%> for the Passover <S%H6453>offerings<s%> two <S%H505>thousand<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> small <S%H7969>livestock,<s%> and three <S%H3967>hundred<s%> head of <S%H1241>cattle.<s%>

<S%H3562>Conaniah<s%> <S%H8098>also,<s%> and Shemaiah and <S%H5417>Nethanel,<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> and <S%H2811>Hashabiah<s%> and <S%H3273>Jeiel<s%> and <S%H3107>Jozabad,<s%> the <S%H8269>chiefs<s%> of the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> <S%H7311>gave<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> for the Passover <S%H6453>offerings<s%> <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> small <S%H2568>livestock,<s%> and five <S%H3967>hundred<s%> head of <S%H1241>cattle.<s%>

So the <S%H5656>service<s%> was <S%H3559>prepared,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in their <S%H5977>place,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> by their <S%H4256>divisions,<s%> according to the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H4687>commandment.<s%>

They <S%H7819>killed<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests<s%> <S%H2236>sprinkled<s%> the blood which they received of their <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> flayed <S%H6584>them.<s%>

They <S%H5493>removed<s%> the burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> that they might <S%H5414>give<s%> them according to the <S%H4653>divisions<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%>' houses of the children of the <S%H1121>people,<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> to <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> as it is <S%H3789>written<s%> in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses.<s%> So they did with the <S%H1241>cattle.<s%>

They <S%H1310>roasted<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> with <S%H784>fire<s%> according to the <S%H4941>ordinance:<s%> and the <S%H6944>holy<s%> offerings <S%H1310>boiled<s%> they in <S%H5518>pots,<s%> and in <S%H1731>caldrons,<s%> and in <S%H6745>pans,<s%> and carried them <S%H7323>quickly<s%> to all the children of the <S%H1121>people.<s%>

<S%H310>Afterward<s%> they <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for <S%H3548>themselves,<s%> and for the priests, because the <S%H3548>priests<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> were busy with <S%H5927>offering<s%> the burnt <S%H5927>offerings<s%> and the <S%H2459>fat<s%> until <S%H3915>night:<s%> therefore the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> <S%H3559>prepared<s%> for <S%H3548>themselves,<s%> and for the priests the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

The <S%H7891>singers<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H623>Asaph<s%> were in their <S%H4612>place,<s%> according to the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H1732>David,<s%> and <S%H623>Asaph,<s%> and <S%H1968>Heman,<s%> and <S%H3038>Jeduthun<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%>'s <S%H2374>seer;<s%> and the <S%H7778>porters<s%> were at every <S%H8179>gate:<s%> they <S%H5493>didn't<s%> need to depart from their <S%H5656>service;<s%> for their <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> prepared for <S%H3559>them.<s%>

So all the <S%H5656>service<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was <S%H3559>prepared<s%> the same <S%H3117>day,<s%> to <S%H6213>keep<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover,<s%> and to <S%H5927>offer<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings<s%> on the <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> according to the <S%H4687>commandment<s%> of <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah.<s%>

The <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who were <S%H4672>present<s%> <S%H6213>kept<s%> the <S%H6453>Passover<s%> at that <S%H6256>time,<s%> and the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>

There was no <S%H6453>Passover<s%> <S%H3644>like<s%> that <S%H6213>kept<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet;<s%> neither <S%H6213>did<s%> any of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>keep<s%> such a <S%H6453>Passover<s%> as <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> <S%H6213>kept,<s%> and the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> and all <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel<s%> who were <S%H4672>present,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>
In the <S%H8083>eighteenth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of the <S%H4438>reign<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> was this <S%H6453>Passover<s%> <S%H6213>kept.<s%>

<S%H310>After<s%> all <S%H2977>this,<s%> when Josiah had <S%H3559>prepared<s%> the <S%H1004>temple,<s%> <S%H5224>Neco<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3751>Carchemish<s%> by the <S%H6578>Euphrates:<s%> and <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> against <S%H7125>him.<s%>

But he <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>ambassadors<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, "What have I to do with <S%H4428>you,<s%> you king of <S%H3063>Judah?<s%> I come not against you this <S%H3117>day,<s%> but against the <S%H1004>house<s%> with which I have <S%H4421>war.<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> has <S%H559>commanded<s%> me to make <S%H926>haste.<s%> <S%H2308>Beware<s%> that it is <S%H430>God<s%> who is with <S%H7843>me,<s%> that he not destroy you."

Nevertheless <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> would not <S%H5437>turn<s%> his <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H2664>him,<s%> but disguised <S%H3898>himself,<s%> that he might fight with <S%H8085>him,<s%> and didn't listen to the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H5224>Neco<s%> from the <S%H6310>mouth<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H3898>fight<s%> in the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo.<s%>

The <S%H3384>archers<s%> <S%H3384>shot<s%> at <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H2977>Josiah;<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> "Take me <S%H5674>away,<s%> because I am <S%H3966>seriously<s%> <S%H2470>wounded!<s%>"

So his <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H5674>took<s%> him out of the <S%H4818>chariot,<s%> and <S%H7392>put<s%> him in the <S%H4932>second<s%> <S%H7393>chariot<s%> that he <S%H3212>had,<s%> and brought him to <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and he <S%H4191>died,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H6913>tombs<s%> of his <S%H1>fathers.<s%> All <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> <S%H56>mourned<s%> for <S%H2977>Josiah.<s%>

<S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H6969>lamented<s%> for <S%H2977>Josiah:<s%> and all the singing <S%H7891>men<s%> and singing <S%H7891>women<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> in their <S%H7015>lamentations<s%> to this <S%H3117>day;<s%> and they <S%H5414>made<s%> them an <S%H2706>ordinance<s%> in <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> and <S%H3789>behold,<s%> they are written in the <S%H7015>lamentations.<s%>

Now the <S%H3499>rest<s%> of the <S%H1697>acts<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> and his <S%H2617>good<s%> <S%H3789>deeds,<s%> according to that which is written in the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%>

and his <S%H1697>acts,<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%> and <S%H314>last,<s%> <S%H3789>behold,<s%> they are written in the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah.<s%>
